message.processing_error: API processing has encountered an error.

sqlite.connection_established: The connection to the SQLite database has been established.
sqlite.connection_not_established: The connection to the SQLite database has not been established.

ddl.table_not_dropped: The table has not been dropped.

ddl.table_not_altered: The table has not been altered.
ddl.table_retrieved: The table has been successfully retrieved.
ddl.table_info_retrieved: The table information has been successfully retrieved.
ddl.no_columns_specified: No columns specified for table alteration.

dml.data_inserted: The data has been successfully inserted.
dml.data_not_inserted: The data has not been inserted.

dml.data_not_updated: The data has not been updated.
dml.data_deleted: The data has been successfully deleted.
dml.data_not_deleted: The data has not been deleted.
dml.query_preview: The SQL query has been successfully previewed.

api_key.missing: API key is missing from request headers.
